entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to debug on iOS 18 DEVICE, Xcode 16, lots of warnings, won't hit breakpoints #25395
  • didn't find curly braces #25394

Closed

  • DeploymentManagerCS is back - app can't start #25062
  • [MAUI] ListView rendering issues when binding the IsVisible property. #25221
  • In VS2022 17.11 Preview 5.0, when creating multi-project solution, the solution file gets duplicated and the progress is shown indefinitely #25213

PullRequests

Created

  • SwipeItemView won't render FontImageSource on first opening - fix #25397
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [WIP] Avoid creating XamlTypeResolver for compiled bindings to avoid ILC warnings #25396
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Perf : ButtonContentTypeConverter now using InvariantCulture to parse… #25393
    community ✨
  • [Android] ClearButtonVisibility with margin fix #25392
    community ✨

Merged

  • [net9.0] Run device tests arm #25331
    do-not-merge
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [XC] compile StaticResource w/ generics #25352
    area-xaml

Updated

  • HybridWebView: Invoke .NET methods from JavaScript #25077
    area-controls-hybridwebview, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA
  • [blazorwebview] align `SupportedOSPlatform` attribute with templates #25073
    area-blazor
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [X] don't expand types to Extension for x:Static #17276
    area-xaml
  • Set title on maui-blazor template window #25387
    area-templates
  • Make Style nullable #25230
    community ✨
  • Fix for issue 23316 Android AVIF support with Glide #25376
    platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge
  • [gh actions] introduce "inclusive heat sensor" #25389
  • Merge sr9 into net9 ga #25265
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Re-enable tests #25268
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Moving last Xamarin.UITests to Appium #25366
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • Measure invalidation performance and fixes (batching version) #24823
    community ✨
